redeems the action genre by misdirecting from its formulaic bore and still holding up as one of the best of its kind, ten years later. I forgot how unique Christopher Nolan is as a director despite his massive accessibility. His creative talent and ambitious filmmaking are what make his films such an incredible experience to watch in theaters. The Hans Zimmer scores never get old, as well.
